channel.title: Neil Robinson, CPA, CA on Neil Robinson

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Neil Robinson and I am a Chartered Professional Accountant. I am an expert in Canadian taxation with specialization corporate income tax, personal income tax, sales taxes. Furthermore, I have 8 years experience in a public accounting setting with strong financial accounting, auditing, and analytical abilities. I have a passion for financial numbers and helping individuals meet their financial goals. Most of my experience includes helping successful small businesses and wealthy individuals with their business and personal taxes.
